name: Ice Patrol
description:
Protect the penguins!

A huge meteor shower has threatened the peaceful waters of Antarctica! You must take control of the last huddle of penguins as you help them defend their home waters from an endless barrage of sharks, meteors, bombs and other surprises.

• Eat the falling meteors & defuse incoming bombs
• Don't miss anything or you may attract hungry sharks!
• Game Center Challenges, Leaderboards & Achievements to unlock!
• Hidden bonuses and power ups!
• Exclusive for iOS

We welcome your feedback, comments and suggestions for future updates: info@bluetunastudios.com
